means: （尤指体育运动）属于可能胜出者行列之内

sentence.Network_en: By my reckoning we were seven or eight kilometres from Borj Mechaab.
sentence.Network_cn: 据我估计我们离梅卡巴堡有七八公里远。

sentence.Network_en: Police officers on the case are reckoning to charge someone very shortly.
sentence.Network_cn: 调查这个案子的警官正在考虑尽快起诉嫌疑人。

sentence.Network_en: The day of reckoning is coming for the water company directors.
sentence.Network_cn: 跟自来水公司的主管们算账的日子就要到来了。

BEC剑桥商务英语中级词汇.......... ... reckon v. 估算，认为 reckoning n. 计算，估算；算账 recoil vi. 弹回，跳回，弹回；退却，缩回.

list.abs: 久石让歌曲 ... +太阳照常升起- The Sun Also Rises +最后的一枪- Final Reckoning +背叛之夜- Night Of The Betrayal.
reckon as看做reckon on依靠；指望；希冀calculate reckon推算
reckon as看做reckon on依靠；指望；希冀calculate reckon推算
recitation 背诵；详述；列举reckon up 合计reckon 数
dead pulley 空转轮dead reckoning 位置坐标推算法dead rock 脉石
推算定位（Dead reckoning）是典型的独立定位技术。卫星定位技术是把卫星定位接收器安装在车辆上来获得车辆位置。

entry.tran: （尤指并不十分准确的）预计，估计，估算
entry.def: Some-one's reckoning is a calculation they make about something, especially a calculation that is not very exact.

example.ex: By my reckoning we were seven or eight kilometres from Borj Mechaab.
example.tran: 据我估计我们离梅卡巴堡有七八公里远。

entry.def: If you say that you will have a reckoning with someone, you mean that you will face them at some time in the future and punish them for something they have done.

example.ex: She knew their truce would not last. There would be a reckoning. There would be another fight.
example.tran: 她早知道他们之间的休战持续不了多长时间。他们之间的账迟早要清算。还将会有一场争斗。

means.word_mean: 1. problem solving that involves numbers or quantities
2. a bill for an amount due

sentences.en: The shoplifter’s day of reckoning came when he was charged with 30 cases of theft.
sentences.cn: 那个冒充顾客进商店行窃的扒手被指控盗窃30次,他遭报应的日子来临了。

sentences.en: The waiter gave me the reckoning.
Tomorrow is the day of reckoning; the accountant will tell me what my profits were and how much tax I’ll have to pay.
sentences.cn: 明天就是算总账的日子,会计师会告诉我有多少盈利,该交多少税。

means.word_mean: (尤指体育运动)属于可能胜出者行列之内，有可能获胜

sentences.en: Phelan is fit again and could come into the reckoning.
sentences.cn: 菲兰已经恢复了体力，有可能获胜。
